name: AmIRight

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: am i right
des:
Search engines are great for figuring out what is right, but sometimes you just want the world to know that you are right. When you ask Am I Right a question, it will always tell you that you are right. It will then continue to tell you that you are right for the next minute as people repeat the question to make sure. Just when people start to think that Am I Right will always tell you that you are right, it will start telling everybody that they are wrong about everything! After a few minutes, the timer resets and you can ask a question again.

Note that Am I Right doesn't look anything up, and it doesn't store your questions. It is a simple sleight-of-hand trick using timing. You need to make sure that you get the timing right, or the trick will not work.
